json.title: Edit JSON — {verb}
json.shapeHintTitle: What shape should this JSON be?
json.shapeHintBody: Use keys like “Présent”, “Passé composé”, etc., and inside each, provide person keys “je”, “tu”, “il/elle/on”, “nous”, “vous”, “ils/elles”. The drill loader maps internal IDs to these display keys.
